translations: 零；（用于某些短语）无，乌有

sentences.sentence: I give the programme nought out of ten for humour.
sentences.translation: 我给这个节目的幽默打零分。

sentences.sentence: A wise man does not waste so good a commodity as lying for nought.
sentences.translation: 聪明的人不会平白无故地浪费这么好的东西。

sentences.sentence: Imagination hath nought to do with it!
sentences.translation: 这跟想象一点关系也没有！
